title: Surgerii Robotics obtains Series D funding to take single-port system global
description:
Surgerii Robotics has raised funding to further develop and market its SHURUI single-port endoscopic robot in Europe and globally.

The post Surgerii Robotics obtains Series D funding to take single-port system global appeared first on The Robot Report.
